txt.en: Bethan Hove has asked you to defeat the goblins that have taken over her family's farm.\n\nThe Hove family farm is in northern Cardolan.
Goblins have driven the Hove family from their farm and have taken over!

'Oh, hello. I am Bethan Hove. Did you come here from the west? Have you been to our farm too, I wonder? The Scurlocs have been so kind to us. They took us in when a wretched band of goblins drove us off our land! The fiends killed our cows and ate all of our food. Poor Nelly. She was such a good cow, too!\n\n'We do not have much, but if you happen to go back in that direction, give those goblins a taste of their own medicine. I would be so grateful! You will find our farm west of here.'
